publication.abstract: A thorough understanding of the fragmentation processes in MS/MS can be a powerful tool in assessing the resulting peptide and protein identifications. We here present the freely available, open-source FragmentationAnalyzer tool (http://fragmentation-analyzer. googlecode.com) that makes it straightforward to analyze large MS/MS data sets for specific types of identified peptides, using a common set of peptide properties. This enables the detection of fragmentation pattern nuances related to specific instruments or due to the presence of post-translational modifications. Â© 2010 WILEY-VCH Verlag GmbH & Co. KGaA.
publication.title: FragmentationAnalyzer: An open-source tool to analyze MS/MS fragmentation data

summary.description: A tool for analyzing MS/MS fragmentation data.
summary.name: FragmentationAnalyzer
